pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider × Kamen Rider W & Decade: Movie War 2010 (2009, movie)$(li)Kamen Rider × Kamen Rider OOO & W Featuring Skull: Movie War Core (2010, movie)$(br2)Used to craft Skull's $(l:w/devices/lostdriver_skull)Lostdriver (Skull)$(/l)
